column4: Hello, How do you get winrar to work on UBuntu 6.06, or unrar as it was calle,d as they no longer work for me, says they are commercial?
david i have, unrar package but it doesnt work
unrar-free only opens old type or .rars not the new types that is what i download
something to do with unicode i am unsure of the specifics but i know it doesnt open what i download after its installed
it used to but then i am sure it suddenyl went commercial
as it used to be called unrar not unrar-free
enable Multiverse
i see it in Multiverse
enable Multiverse and update your package info
depending upon your sound chipset and the PulseAudio drivers for it, you may only be able to get sound from one app at a time.
that's frustrating. Is there any way to varify that? and, if that is my case, how do i switch between the volumes of amarok, and google chrome?
you need to find out if your sound chipset supports hardware mixing. most onboard chips do not.
how?
lspci -vvv
then take that information to Google
sorry, i don;t keep a list of the features of every audio chipset ever made in my head. ;)
lol of course not
http://paste.ubuntu.com/390456/
and by the way, internet sound works when amarok is closed

well, i have a choice. help you with every step of basic research into audio hardware, or go with my wife to the store. she's waiting. she's warm beside me in bed at night. you aren't, and so you lose. ;)
lolno pob. family first!
could u get back to me later if we both happen to be on?
